alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 05 at 9:12PM MST until January 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Wind Chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Sterling, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 3 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
